name: The Pool Party
description:
A little visual novel made in gamemaker.

A Husky and Pine Marten are invited to a Pool party hosted by otters.

One route will be finished by the end of September. I will consider the game complete by that point as the other route is written by someone else.

This is merely a test for my visual novel engine. It's not intended to be deep or long.

By VentKazemaru/OTTER

sounds provided from freesound.com

music by gustune
